channel.title: How do i log onto my server
channel.description: amm hey guys i have been on a tut looking to make my own server i do everything precisely right an i jsut wanna no how do i actually log into it i type name pass and server but it says error connecting to server? do i have to run something im running run&compile while i try an log in but still not werking? please help .......lol whoeva helps can be admin on the server =p :| :| :confused: :confused: :confused:[br][size=1]Posted at: August 17, 2006, 06:24:57 AM[/size][hr]any1?

item.title: How do i log onto my server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ok before u run&complie right click on run&complie and click edit delete whatever it comes up with then put in somthing like this@echo off COLOR 08 title YourClientNameHere Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\bin/java.exe" server pause

then save it and close it.
Once uve done that click run&complie and then open whitescape and log in(considering i dont and never have used whitescape i dont know if u have to put in server name or not but if it doesnt work when u dont put it in then put it in and try).

Shadow.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i log onto my server

item.description:
@system wrote:

start server not compiler use moparscape and use ip localhost??

item.title: How do i log onto my server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

1st read my TuT its in my sig.
Now when u open the paste where u have that Run&compile thing forget it, run&compile is only when u modify anything on the server,The run server thingy is what is important so

-Run&Compile-> To complie any changes u have made like in client.java

-RunServer-> to run server to ppl can join in

also when u connet YOU!!!must always put server ip has 0.0.0.0[br][size=1]Posted at: August 17, 2006, 07:43:36 AM[/size][hr]U MUST BE RUNING THE RunServer THINGY SO PPL CAN JOIN IN!

Read full topic

item.title: How do i log onto my server
item.dc:creator: @PUR3_AVENG3 PUR3 AVENG3
item.description:
@PUR3_AVENG3 wrote:

u gotta have your server running aswell. SO where your server is saved click on the runserver.bat in that folder. Then once it says its ready on the windows listerner your should be able to log in.
